blocks.text: Example 21. Find the value of \( \int \frac{5x}{x^{2}+4} \, dx \) .

blocks.description: This equation calculates the integral of the function using logarithmic integration.

blocks.text: As an alternative method of solution, the graphic process of integration possesses certain advantages in a case such as this.
It might even help to plot the curve of \( \frac{5x}{x^{2}+4} \) and find the area between it, the axis of x and the ordinates through \( x = 1 \) and \( x = 2 \).
The table for the plotting reads:

blocks.caption: Table of values for the curve plot.
